Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package node-problem-detector for versions less than 0.8.10-16
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package node-problem-detector for versions less than 0.8.10-16. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package node-problem-detector is earlier than 0.8.10-16, affected by CVE-2023-44487
